name: Pixel Dash!
description:
Dash around an ever changing maze while trying to avoid the pursuers.

Avoid the chasing dots for as long as you can, collect power-ups to help you along the way and be careful not to get caught in a closing path.

Features:
• Supports all screen sizes
• Game Center integration
• Great sound effects
• Colour blind modes
• Facebook & Twitter integration
• Minimalist design
• Developed by one person (support Indie)
